project.name: Godrej Alira
project.about:
Godrej Alira in Sector 39, Gurgaon, is a landmark luxury residential project by Godrej Properties, designed to set new standards for sophisticated urban living in the heart of Gurugram. Spanning 2 acres, this exclusive enclave features a single G+30 tower with only 120 ultra-premium 3 and 4 BHK residences, each offering expansive layouts from approximately 2,500 to 3,500 sq. ft. The development’s low-density design ensures unmatched privacy and exclusivity, with just four apartments per floor and a grand triple-height lobby with private elevators.

Exemplary Design & Amenities

  • 2 Acres| Single G+30 Floor Tower| 120 Units
  • Configurations: 3 and 4 BHK
  • Unit Sizes: Ranging from 2,500 sq. ft. to 3,500 sq. ft.
  • Low-density project with only 4 apartments per core
  • A 40000 sq. ft. Exclusive Clubhouse.
  • RERA: GGM/959/691/2025/62.
  • Possession: April-2032.

Exclusive Amenities:

  • Sports & Fitness- Paddle Court, Badminton Court, Fitness Zone, Golf Putting, Palm Pool.
  • Wellness & Leisure- Zen Garden, Jacuzzi, Café & Bar
  • Recreation & Entertainment- Indoor Gaming Arena, Multipurpose Hall
  • Kids & Family - Tree House, Kid’s Playzone
  • Accessibility & Convenience - Wheelchair Friendly, Vehicular Movement on Surface Level

Prime Location Sector 39 Gurgaon

Sector 39, strategically positioned along Sohna Road, is fast becoming a prime residential hub in Gurugram, providing excellent access to Delhi, key business districts like Cyber City and Udyog Vihar, and the IGI Airport, all within a short drive for unmatched travel convenience.

Nearby IT Parks & Offices

  • Unitech Business Park – 3 Km
  • Spaze IT Park – 4 Km
  • Cyber City – 9 Km
  • IFC – 6 km
  • Global Business Park – 8 Km

Nearby Educational Institutions

  • Manav Rachna – 1 Km
  • DPS Gurgaon – 8 Km
  • KR Mangalam World School - 3 Km
  • GD Goenka – 3 km
  • Presidium - 1 Km

Access to Reputed Healthcare

  • Medanta Medicity – 1 Km
  • Fortis Hospital – 2 Km
  • Artemis Hospital – 2 Km
  • Max Hospital – 3 Km

Nearby Malls & Entertainments

  • Tau Devilal Sports Complex – 2 Km
  • City Centre Mall – 5 Km
  • Upcoming 10 Acres of mall by IKEA – 1 Km

Upcoming Infrastructure Development in Sector 39, Gurgaon

  • New Gurugram Metro Line (Millennium City Centre to Cyber City): A 28.5 km elevated metro corridor is under planning and tendering, expected to be completed by 2026–27.
  • Expressway Expansion & Connectivity Boost: The 5.1 km Dwarka Expressway tunnel, part of Phase 4, is currently in trial operations and slated for full commissioning by June 2025.
  • Sohna Elevated Corridor (Gurugram–Sohna): It facilitates faster and smoother travel across key parts of Gurugram.
  • City-wide CCTV & Traffic Management Upgrade: GMDA is implementing a 141 crore rs. initiative to deploy 2,722 CCTV cameras across the city.

Impact of IT Hubs

  • DLF Cyber City: Cyber City, one of Gurugram’s largest corporate hubs with marquee names like Deloitte, Accenture, and IBM, drives a steady influx of high-income professionals to the area.
  • Udyog Vihar: Udyog Vihar, a major IT/ITES hub, is easily accessible from Sector 39, attracting professionals and driving strong housing demand and steady property growth.
  • Unitech Business Park: Hosts various technology and corporate offices, offering job opportunities and increasing the appeal of quality housing close by.
  • Global Business Park: MG Road, an emerging IT hub with top international tenants, is boosting residential demand in nearby areas such as Sector 39

Top Reasons to Invest in Godrej Alria Sector 39 Gurgaon

  • Prime Connectivity: Seamless access to NH-48, Sohna Road, and IGI Airport ensures stress-free travel to key business hubs.
  • Infrastructure Growth: Upcoming metro lines, expressways, and elevated corridors will enhance future connectivity and convenience.
  • Strong Growth Potential: New commercial and retail projects nearby will boost rental yields and resale value.
  • Trusted Brand: Backed by Godrej Properties, known for quality, timely delivery, and thoughtful planning, ensuring investment confidence.

About Godrej Properties

Godrej Properties is a reputable name in the Indian real estate sector, established in 1990 as a subsidiary of the Godrej Group, which has over 125 years of experience. The company holds a CRISIL A+ rating, reflecting its financial stability and strong project execution capabilities. With over 300 completed projects and more than 180 million square feet delivered, Godrej Properties is recognized for its commitment to sustainability.

Awards & Recognition:

  • Over 400 awards, including recognition for ‘Environmental and Social initiatives-2023
  • Gold Award for Gender Equality at the ICAI International Sustainability Reporting Awards 2022
  • The Economic Times Best Real Estate Brand 2018
  • Builder of the Year at the CNBC-Awaaz Real Estate Awards 2018

Conclusion

Godrej Alira Sector 39 Gurgaon stands out as a benchmark for ultra-luxurious, sustainable living in a prime location. With its limited-edition residences, world-class amenities, and the assurance of Godrej Properties’ legacy, it is an exceptional choice for discerning homeowners and investors seeking long-term value and an elevated lifestyle in the heart of Gurugram.

builder_info.name: Godrej
builder_info.description: Real estate firm Godrej Properties Limited is headquartered in Mumbai, India. The company was established in 1990 by Adi Godrej and is a division of Godrej Industries Limited. Currently, the company is working on projects expected to total more than 89.7 million square feet. The Godrej Group has many businesses, including construction, fast-moving consumer products, high-tech engineering, furnishings, safety, and agro-based. faq.question: What is the possession date for Godrej Alira?
faq.answer: The possession date for Godrej Alira is April 2032.

faq.question: What are the unit sizes available in Godrej Alira?
faq.answer: The unit sizes available in Godrej Alira range from approximately 2,500 to 3,500 sq. ft.

faq.question: How many units are there in Godrej Alira?
faq.answer: There are a total of 120 units in Godrej Alira.
